page.description: Continuously capture the user's location using the Background Geolocation-LT plugin.

discussion.p: The Background Geolocation-LT plugin allows for continue capture of the device's location. This allows you to track the user over time when the app is running in the background or when the device is locked.
For examples for how to use this plugin, see the [UX Template: PhoneGap - iOS Background Geolocation] or watch the videos below.
